column4: do i just get mozilla-mplayer? or do i also need win32-codecs-1.6-3? what do you make of stuNNed 's advice to get gstreamer?

klaas,  WMAis  not working. Firefox asked me if I want to open the .Wax file. I choose "open with /usr/bin/gmplayer (default). Then Gmplayer program opens. Then an error window: "New_face failed. maybe the font path is wrong. Please supply the text font file (~/.mplayer/subfont.ttf)
could you help me set up WMA for my 3 day old ubuntu?
